value.value:
@if(
  less(  pipeline().parameters.brpExtractFrom,
formatDateTime(replace(activity('GET TGT HWM  SQL').output.firstRow.HighWaterMark,' ','T'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fff')), 
pipeline().parameters.brpExtractFrom,
formatDateTime(replace(activity('GET TGT HWM  SQL').output.firstRow.HighWaterMark,' ','T'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fff'))
